data.comment: The match is underway in Bronx.
Dru Yearwood for New York drives towards goal at Yankee Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 1, Throw-in for New York at Yankee Stadium.
Joseph Dickerson awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for New York City in their own half.
In the minute 3, Ball safe as New York is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
New York needs to be cautious. New York City have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 4, Joseph Dickerson awards New York a goal kick.
Throw-in for New York close to the penalty box.
New York City awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 5, Throw-in New York.
New York City awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for New York in the half of New York City.
In the minute 7, Joseph Dickerson signals a New York throw-in in New York City's half.
Free kick New York City.
Throw-in for New York at Yankee Stadium.
In the minute 9, In Bronx a free kick has been awarded the away team.
New York City have a goal kick.
Throw-in New York.
In the minute 11, Ball safe as New York is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to New York.
Can New York City get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in New York's half?
In the minute 12, Goal! Valentin Castellanos heads New York City into a 1-0 lead.
Maxi Moralez with an assist there.
Free kick for New York in the half of New York City.
In the minute 14, Can New York capitalize from this throw-in deep inside New York City's half?
Aaron Long gets his shot on target but fails to score for New York.
New York City's Valentin Castellanos has run offside.
In the minute 16, Throw-in high up the field for New York in Bronx.
Ball goes out of play for a New York City goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Bronx.
In the minute 17, Joseph Dickerson awards the home team a throw-in.
Brian White grabs a goal to bring things level at 1-1 at Yankee Stadium.
That's a fine assist from Cristian Casseres Jr.
In the minute 19, New York to take a throw-in in New York City territory.
Joseph Dickerson signals a New York throw-in in New York City's half.
Throw-in for New York City in their own half.
In the minute 20, Throw-in for New York City in their own half.
Joseph Dickerson awards the home team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 23, New York City's Maxi Moralez gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for New York at Yankee Stadium.
Throw-in for New York City at Yankee Stadium.
In the minute 25, Can New York City get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in New York's half?
New York City advance rapidly upfield but Joseph Dickerson blows for offside.
Throw-in for New York in the half of New York City.
In the minute 27, New York City have been awarded a corner by Joseph Dickerson.
New York have a goal kick.
Joseph Dickerson signals a free kick to New York.
In the minute 30, New York City's Jesus Medina gets in a shot on goal at Yankee Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to New York City.
In Bronx a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 32, New York City to take a throw-in in New York territory.
New York City awarded a free kick in their own half.
New York City are coming forward and Maxi Moralez gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 35, It's a goal kick for the away team in Bronx.
New York City awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in New York City.
In the minute 36, Can New York City get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in New York's half?
Ball safe as New York City is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick New York.
In the minute 38, Goal! Cristian Casseres Jr gives New York a 1-2 lead.
Brian White instrumental with a fine assist.
Throw-in for New York in the half of New York City.
In the minute 41, Free kick for New York City in their own half.
Kyle Duncan (New York) has received a yellow card from Joseph Dickerson.
Gary Mackay Steven is on target to level the scores at 2-2.
In the minute 42, Great play from Valentin Castellanos to set up the goal.
New York City awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Valentin Castellanos for the home team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 45, New York City drive forward but Valentin Castellanos is judged offside.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Throw-in for New York City in their own half.
In the minute 45, Joseph Dickerson signals a free kick to New York in their own half.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half has started.
Throw-in New York.
In the minute 46, Florian Valot is on a sub for Samuel Tetteh for New York.
Joseph Dickerson signals a New York throw-in in New York City's half.
In the minute 47, New York have a dangerous throw-in.
Joseph Dickerson signals a throw-in for New York, close to New York City's area.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 48, Throw-in for New York close to the penalty box.
New York to take a throw-in in New York City territory.
Ball safe as New York City is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 50, Throw-in for New York City in the half of New York.
Alexander Ring is on target to give New York City a 3-2 advantage.
Jesus Medina with an assist there.
In the minute 53, New York have been awarded a corner by Joseph Dickerson.
New York City awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Bronx New York's Brian White is caught offside.
In the minute 55, Brian White (New York) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Ball goes out of play for a New York City goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 57, Joseph Dickerson awards New York a goal kick.
Goal kick for New York City at Yankee Stadium.
Joseph Dickerson signals a free kick to New York City in their own half.
In the minute 61, In Bronx New York City drive forward through Gary Mackay Steven. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Valentin Castellanos (New York City) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Joseph Dickerson signals a New York City throw-in in New York's half.
In the minute 63, Free kick for New York City in their own half.
Can New York City capitalize from this throw-in deep inside New York's half?
New York have a goal kick.
In the minute 63, The away team replace Dru Yearwood with Omir Fernandez.
Throw-in for New York City at Yankee Stadium.
In the minute 64, New York to take a throw-in in New York City territory.
Gerhard Struber is making the team's third substitution at Yankee Stadium with Caden Clark replacing Jared Stroud.
Can New York get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in New York City's half?
Free kick for New York in the half of New York City.
In the minute 65, New York have a dangerous throw-in.
Joseph Dickerson awards the home team a throw-in.
New York awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 68, Joseph Dickerson signals a free kick to New York.
Keaton Parks (New York City) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
New York have been awarded a corner by Joseph Dickerson.
In the minute 69, Tim Parker (New York) shoots – and rattles the crossbar!
Goal kick for New York City at Yankee Stadium.
Joseph Dickerson signals a free kick to New York in their own half.
In the minute 70, At Yankee Stadium, Jesus Medina has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Free kick for New York in their own half.
Ball safe as New York is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 73, Corner awarded to New York.
New York's Kaku is whistled for offside at Yankee Stadium.
Maxi Moralez for New York City drives towards goal at Yankee Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 75, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
New York needs to be cautious. New York City have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for New York at Yankee Stadium.
In the minute 76, Joseph Dickerson signals a free kick to New York City in their own half.
Goal! Valentin Castellanos extends New York City's lead to 4-2.
New York make their fourth substitution with Tom Barlow replacing Aaron Long.
In the minute 77, Gerhard Struber (New York) is making a fifth substitution, with Mandela Egbo replacing Kyle Duncan.
Free kick for New York City in their own half.
Joseph Dickerson awards New York a goal kick.
In the minute 79, Throw-in high up the field for New York in Bronx.
Throw-in for New York in the half of New York City.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Bronx.
In the minute 83, Brian White for New York is whistled offside.
New York City have been awarded a penalty...
It's now 5-2 to New York City as Valentin Castellanos scores from the spot.
New York awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 85, Tony Rocha is replacing Keaton Parks for the home team.
New York City make their second substitution with Nicolas Acevedo replacing Gary Mackay Steven.
In the minute 86, New York City awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in New York City.
The home team replace Valentin Castellanos with Gudmundur Thorarinsson.
In the minute 87, New York City to take a throw-in in New York territory.
Throw-in for New York City in their own half.
New York City have been awarded a corner by Joseph Dickerson.
Ball goes out of play for a New York goal kick.
Joseph Dickerson awards the away team a throw-in.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Joseph Dickerson signals a free kick to New York in their own half.
Can New York get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in New York City's half?
Corner awarded to New York City.
Important block from the New York defence as Maxime Chanot fires in a strike for New York City.
Maxime Chanot of New York City smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
It's 5-2 as the referee blows for full-time.
Joe Scally is replacing Anton Tinnerholm for New York City at Yankee Stadium.
The home team have replaced Jesus Medina with Juan Torres. This is the fifth substitution made today by Ronny Deila.
